articles.title: Mercury mission to fly by closest planet to the sun for the first time - CNN
articles.description: The BepiColombo space mission will make its first flyby of Mercury around 7:34 p.m. ET on Friday and pass within 124 miles (200 kilometers) of the planet's surface. During the flyby, BepiColombo will collect science data and images and send them back to Earth.
